channel.title: Please help urgent
channel.description:
Hi, on my 562, yell for mods works fine but for admins it doesn't :confused:
I type ` to open the command panel for admins and type yell (message). Am i typing it wrong? Please help?

item.title: Please help urgent
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

Ok, as i said, the commandpackethandler.java (players) has working yell. But the yell code for admins does not work. If anyone could take their time to look at the source and find correct code, I’d appreciate that a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help urgent
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

bluescapepkz:

the command is in commandpackethandler…only its a different command than the one in commandscreenhandler. Arent they supposed to be different? since one is players and other is admins?

You are right, Add an exception or condition.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help urgent
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

Doesn’t work. This is for admins, it goes in commandscreenhandler.java. I also tried a yell code that worked on a different 562, it didn’t work on this. Source is atomicscape 562.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help urgent
item.dc:creator: @killdogz killdogz
item.description:
@killdogz wrote:

[code] if(cmd[0].startsWith(“yell”)){
if (GameEngine.mute.isMuted(player.getUsername())){
player.sm(“You are muted. If you want to be unmuted appeal at forums.”);
return;
}
String yellText = command.substring(7);
yellText = Censor.Replace(yellText);

		for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
			if(player.getRights() == 1) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ff0000>[Moderator]<img=0>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
			if(player.getRights() == 2) {
					p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ff0000>[Administrator]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
			if(player.getRights() == 0) {
					p.getActionSender().sendMessage("[player]"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
			if (player.getUsername().equals("yournamehere")) {
					p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ff0000>[Owner]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
		}
	}

}[/code]

this is the full yell.

Read full topic
